title: Thick vegetable soup with poached eggs
ingredients: ['200g turnips, peeled and chopped', '200g carrots, peeled and chopped', '300g celeriac, peeled and chopped', '4 eggs', '2 tbsp crème fraîche', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'TO SERVE', '4 tsp crème fraîche', 'few chopped capers or 25g chopped walnuts (optional)']
